page-description: Matnbaz is created to detect, collect and showcase Iranian open-source projects, promote open-source, connect developers and create financial solutions for Iranian open-source maintainers.

hero.description: Matnbaz ("open-source" in Persian, pronounced |matn baaz|) is created to detect, collect and showcase Iranian open-source projects, promote open-source, connect developers and create financial solutions for Iranian maintainers.

ease-discovery.title: Collecting {{accent}}
ease-discovery.description: Matnbaz tries to detect and collect all existing Iranian open-source maintainers and their repositories.

explorer.title: Explorer
explorer.description: Find Iranian open-source packages, libraries and projects using different filters.

collections.title: Collections
collections.description: Collections help you find open-source repositories that fit your need easier and faster.

selections.title: Selections
selections.description: Every weekend, we select a few open-source projects and feature them in a blog post. (written in Persian)

promote-open-source.title: Promoting {{accent}}
promote-open-source.description: We try to promote the open-source culture, hoping to inspire more Iranian developers to do open-source work.

education.title: Educational Content
education.description: Our community members write posts about open-source. (In Persian)

events.title: Events
events.description: We'd love to hold events and competitions about open-source developments in the future.

source-code.title: Matnbaz is open-source
source-code.description: The code for back-end, front-end, mobile app and all the graphical content are open-source and publicly available.

developers-network.title: Connecting {{accent}}
developers-network.description: Matnbaz tries to connect Iranian open-source enthusiasts.

discord-community.title: Discord Community
discord-community.description: You can meet other developers and find your future teammates in our Discord community.

top-users.title: Top Users Chart
top-users.description: Meet the most active Iranian developers in GitHub based on their contributions to the open-source.

top-organizations.title: Top Organizations Chart
top-organizations.description: Meet the most active Iranian organizations in GitHub based on their contributions to the open-source.

support.title: Support Matnbaz
support.description: Matnbaz needs support to grow and continue...

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.description: See what features we're working on and what are our plans for the future of Matnbaz.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Read the answers of questions we've been asked about frequently.

guides.title: Open-Source Guides
guides.description: If you're planning to start an open-source project, the open-source guides will definitely help you. (Not maintained by Matnbaz)
